scripts.build: npm run build:leboncoin; npm run build:map; npm run build:spreadsheet;
scripts.build:leboncoin: tsc leboncoin/greasemonkey-leboncoin.header.ts model.ts config.ts cities.ts leboncoin/greasemonkey-leboncoin.ts --out build/greasemonkey-leboncoin.js --skipLibCheck true
scripts.build:map: tsc model.ts config.ts cities.ts map/cities_map.ts --out build/cities_map.js --skipLibCheck true
scripts.build:spreadsheet: tsc model.ts config.ts spreadsheet/home_sweet_home.ts --skipLibCheck true && cat config.js model.js spreadsheet/home_sweet_home.js > build/home_sweet_home.js && rm spreadsheet/home_sweet_home.js && rm config.js && rm model.js
